alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Laurens; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, southeastern Twiggs and northeastern Bleckley Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Goldsboro, or 10 miles northeast of Cochran, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Irwinton, McIntyre, Dudley, Toomsboro, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Goldsboro, Chappells Mill, Rebie, Cary and Nicklesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
